author: Rick Spilman
content: You are, of course, correct. For once the typo was not entirely mine. (A rare thing indeed.) I copied it from the NMA page. Nevertheless, I should have noticed it. I fixed it. Thanks for the catch.

author: Des Pawson
content: What a man , what a loss.His publications will be his memorial , and the quality of his research something to aim for.

author: Richard Bailey
content: I’m going to guess that the last title is meant to be Capstans and Windlassses…captains known to be of uncertain “use at sea.”
